Body:
g = decode('(g / )')
assert g.triples == [('g', ':instance', None)]
g = decode('(g / :ARG0 (i / i))')
assert g.triples == [('g', ':instance', None), ('g', ':ARG0', 'i'), ('i',
    ':instance', 'i')]
g = decode('(g / go :ARG0 :ARG1 (t / there))')
assert g.triples == [('g', ':instance', 'go'), ('g', ':ARG0', None), ('g',
    ':ARG1', 't'), ('t', ':instance', 'there')]
with pytest.raises(penman.DecodeError):
    decode('(')
with pytest.raises(penman.DecodeError):
    decode('(a')
with pytest.raises(penman.DecodeError):
    decode('(a /')
with pytest.raises(penman.DecodeError):
    decode('(a / alpha')
with pytest.raises(penman.DecodeError):
    decode('(a b)')
